name: Halo Infinite Level Design (gearshiftmedia)
description:
A Halo Infinite themed level built in Unreal Engine. 

Chief must get inside of the edge of the Halo ring, but the banished have fortified the entrance heavily. During a tropical storm, the pelican drops you off to take down the control towers and enter the edge of the ring. 

NOTE: This build does contain enemies, but has worse blockout visuals. 

To learn more about this level and the development of the project visit:  Halo Level Design Personal Project | by Kaleb Nekumanesh | Medium
